name: Triggers King’s Rock
description: This move can trigger the effects of King’s Rock.

name: Accuracy check
description: This move uses the standard accuracy check.

name: Makes contact
description: This move causes the user to make contact with the target.

name: Blocked by Protect
description: This move will not work if the target has used Protect or Detect this turn.

name: Reflectable
description: This move can be reflected back at the user with Magic Coat or Magic Bounce.

name: Snatchable
description: The effects of this move can be stolen by a Pokémon using Snatch.

name: Copied by Mirror Move
description: This move can be copied by Mirror Move.

name: Has a charging turn
description: This move has a charging turn that can be skipped with a Power Herb.

name: Must recharge
description: The turn after this move is used, the Pokémon's action is skipped so it can recharge.

name: Punch-based
description: This move has 1.2× its usual power when used by a Pokémon with Iron Fist.

name: Sound-based
description: Pokémon with Soundproof are immune to this move.

name: Unusable during Gravity
description: This move cannot be used in high Gravity.

name: Defrosts when used
description: This move can be used while frozen to force the Pokémon to defrost.

name: Targets opposite side in triples
description: In triple battles, this move can target Pokémon on the opposite side from the user.

name: Heals
description: This move is blocked by Heal Block.

name: Ignores Substitute
description: This move ignores the target's Substitute.

name: Unusable during Sky Battles
description: This move is unusable during Sky Battles.

name: Ally Animation
description: This move's animation plays when it targets an ally.

name: Dance
description: This move triggers Dancer.

name: Metronome
description: This move can be called by Metronome.
